item.title: Mobile On-device AI
item.description: A lot of the buzz around AI is about big cloud models, but Iâ€™ve often wondered what we can do with AI right on our phones and tablets - making things more private, fast, and user-friendly. As someone who is passionate about mobile development and has been tinkering a lot with AI recently, I am fascinated by what happens when mobile development and AI come together - especially the possibilities of running AI directly on the device.
